PEOPLE

With people at the heart of what we do, our passion is serving, not selling.

QUALITY

Highest quality in custom apparel is our standard, and we pride ourselves on meeting that mark with every project we work on.

CREATIVITY

We aim to deliver on our clients' vision with a creative approach to produce unique apparel that stands apart from the rest.

OUR STORY

TruThreads started in 2013 with the goal of providing great service and a great product, while keeping prices low. We have grown every year by following these values.

We're a family owned business that works hard, and loves what we do. We have a passion for ministries, small businesses, and helping people in any way we can. Our regular customers can attest that they receive an old fashioned service with modern techniques. What we quote for custom prints, is what you'll pay. We don't add on surprise fees after the fact. That means no screen fees, set up fees, or any other extra fees not outlined in the quote. We are dedicated to offering the highest value, while benefitting the customer first and foremost.

WHAT WE OFFER

We provide a wide range of services to meet any apparel needs you may have.

SCREEN-PRINTING

We use the highest quality inks and screens, printed on top-end, industry fabrics for a premium product that looks and feels great.

EMBROIDERY

With our state-of-the-art machine embroidery production, let us refine your brand's look, and add a level of sophistication that beautifully threaded embroidery can provide.

CAD CUT VINYL

Durability and presentation. With full color printing and precision cutting, our vinyl will provide the look, and practicality, you and your business need.
